meanings: (권리·자격 등을) lose, be deprived of, (formal) be divested of

vlive.korean: 에너지를 다 빼앗겨요. You'll lose all your energy. 듣기 View video ASTRO : 차MC차엠쒸🤗
[얼른 와] 2등은 빼앗기지... [Come here] Don't let others win second place. 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.95
vlive.english: [Come here] Don't let others win second place.

vlive.korean: [저세상 CG에 맘을 빼앗긴 마크] 그 있잖아 엑스맨에 나오는... [MARK focused on great CG] You know, the one from the X-man. 듣기 View video OSEN : NCT 127, 드디어 9명으로 돌아왔다! #스타로드 01
vlive.english: [MARK focused on great CG] You know, the one from the X-man.

vlive.korean: [호주즈2 필릭스에게 간발의 차로 맛집을 빼앗긴 찬가이드] 용복! [FELIX found the restaurant first] Yongbok! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [FULL] <찾았다 스트레이키즈> 2화
또 미끼를 빼앗겼다는... The bait is gone again... 듣기 View video Girl's Day : 민아와 심쿵방송 3 ♡

examples.korean: Several of our employees have been poached by a rival firm. 발음듣기 우리 직원들 중 몇 명을 경쟁 회사에 빼앗겨 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Several of our employees have been poached by a rival firm. 발음

examples.korean: He was so lost[engrossed] in comic book that he didn't even hear me come in. 발음듣기 그는 만화책에 정신을 빼앗겨 내가 들어온 줄도 몰랐다 Neungyule
examples.english: He was so lost[engrossed] in comic book that he didn't even hear me come in. 발음

examples.korean: It means the state of having no doubts[being free of delusions]. 발음듣기 세상일에 정신을 빼앗겨 갈팡질팡하거나 판단을 흐리는 일이 없게 되었음을 뜻한다. Neungyule
examples.english: It means the state of having no doubts[being free of delusions]. 발음

examples.korean: In winter, our skin often becomes dry and chaps[cracks] easily. 발음듣기 겨울철에는 피부가 수분을 빼앗겨 트기 쉽다 Neungyule
examples.english: In winter, our skin often becomes dry and chaps[cracks] easily. 발음

examples.korean: He was harassed by the continual demands upon his time of trivial things. 발음듣기 그는 사소한 일에 끊임없이 시간을 빼앗겨 애를 태웠다. 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: He was harassed by the continual demands upon his time of trivial things. 발음
